Posts.Content: Please try JOHN HOPKINS HOSPITAL, (school of medicine) they can help you i am sure.
Posts.Title: financial help

Posts.Content: If you have some kind of insurance, some medical university schools will take most of them.ALSO i know organizations that help with the treatments, hospitalization etc.. contact the cancer society and other organizations (I was told that when I went to have my surgery last year). You probably can check with some of the reknown hospitals like CANCER CENTERS OF AMERICA or...and even if they don't help you with treatment, they can give you information of other places that will and have 'private gifts' to help people like you, depending the area you are.
Posts.Title: financial help

Posts.Content: I don't 100% agree with 'financial help' but shee is right in some things.. there are manay (millions) of people without insurance ( for ex. my daughter, I too -only cover by my husband since i retire before time- and know several people without it) A few years ago, a knew a young lady (about 26-28) who was working (minimum pay) but had no insurance. She died of breast cancer, she wasn't able to get help until a few days of her dead. TOO LATE, NO TREATMENT. I KNOW NOW that are some places that will help you if you are in this situation. You must check al look and don't stop until you find some where. some medical school hospital can help, and other organizations. Negative thoughts will NOT help your heath.

Posts.Content: THEY ALso sell some kind of infrared blanket (which it is cheaper than a infrared sauna.) check out also cumin oil/black seed oil = nigellia oil, vitamin C (in IV high amounts read or see video youtube).
Posts.Title: Breast cancer

Posts.Content: for the fatigue, may be you can take Co. Q10 9it is good for the heart and fatigue, etc... you should ask your doctor first or research in google for possible contradictions with your medication or cancer. BECAUSE i have the same problem, i was told to take B12 for energy etc.. until I find out that some vitamins can affect you cancer by helping metastazide the tumors. So I stopped taking it. For your fibromyalgia and pain sometimes dark red cherries (fresh, frozen,juice etc), celery seeds tea help a little bit. And anti inflamatory herbs (ginger, cinnamon...) and spices. Also try to keep your body in the alkaline side (when body is too acid the pain is worse). I drink 8.0and higher alkaline spring/mineral water and you can google a list of alkaline foods.

Posts.Content: COFFEE decaf or not is acidic. how can you get it alkaline? or what do you do to make it alkaline?

Please look for comments in 'protocell' in this message board for ca. treatment. I think I am going to try that, because the possitive comments i read. good luck.

Posts.Title: Cancer smell

Posts.Content: I COULDN'T find anything on this link. and I wanted to know because i think i have the same problem. I KNOW MY BODY changed a lot the last few years. And yes, I can smell and (different?) odor (but I think it is possible my diabetes?) evern though no one else can smelled it in my house.
Posts.Title: Cancer smell

Posts.Content: I too knew I had cancer, the doctor looked at me like I was from the Moon or... when I finally had my  digital mamo. they found it. My daughters dog,keep coming to me and leeking at me. I also smelled a light funny smell. I told my family doctor and she told me she too knew in advance she had cancer ...she had removal of her both breast. There are many women who know something is wrong but many doctors do not listen. One lady, even told her doctor that she felt something, her doctor told her it was nothing, with in a year, she was dead with a very agressive cancer. ... an he was a very good doctor, but he didn't listen.
Posts.Title: Cancer smell

Posts.Content: there are very few doctors who really care about knowing this information or other for that matter. The problem is find these doctors who care. Me too knew I had cancer ... things were not right I told the doctor, they didn't care or didn't pay attention to it. I was lucky because I insited and they found it in stage 1, very early THANK GOD!! I KNOW SOME DUGS CAN SMELL CANCER. Yes their is a smell that humans can't smell or at least are NOT prepared to recognize.  There is a board here called  'salbestrols' that some people can help with answers or they may know more. God Bless you all, and good luck.
